original: so; ;'jam dpal /
analyzed: so; ;'jam dpal /

original: ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gang gi lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gang gi lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur /
translated: the maṇḍala of the consecration into great wisdom will be in the hands of whoever possesses this. They will be free from afflictions,

original: 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur /

original: de gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam /
analyzed: de gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam /
translated: and if they are in the midst of thieves,

original: srin po'i nang na 'dug gam /
analyzed: srin po'i nang na 'dug gam /

original: dgra'i nang na 'dug gam /🔽'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste /
analyzed: dgra'i nang na 'dug gam / 'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste /

original: de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur /
translated: weapons will not strike their bodies.

original: chom rkun gyis chom par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: chom rkun gyis chom par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not be robbed by thieves,

original: srin po la sogs pas gtse bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: srin po la sogs pas gtse bar mi 'gyur /
translated: and rākṣasas and so forth will not harm them.

original: de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: They will not have the fear of untimely death,

original: rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur /
analyzed: rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur /
translated: and they will always be glorious.

original: de'i sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur /
translated: All their negative actions will be purified.

original: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig bzhin mngon du 'gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig bzhin mngon du 'gyur /
translated: They will have accumulated the roots of virtue of a hundred thousand quintillion buddhas.

original: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang de sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang de sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur /
translated: At the time of their death, they will be embraced by the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na /
translated: After death, they will go to Sukhāvatī.

original: gang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mi gtong bar 'dzin pa lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mi gtong bar 'dzin pa lta ci smos te /
translated: What need is there to mention those who uphold, read, keep in mind, and do not let go of this dhāraṇī?

original: de'i sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All their obscurations will be purified.🔽The doors to the lower realms will be closed to them.

original: de sang na song gi sgo rnams bcad par 'gyur ro; ;des ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsrings par 'gyur /
analyzed: de sang na song gi sgo rnams bcad par 'gyur ro; ;des ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsrings par 'gyur /
translated: They will be far from the lower realms.

original: gang zhig gnang par langs nas su //
analyzed: gang zhig gnang par langs nas su //
translated: Whoever rises in the morning🔽and reads this once

original: lan gcig klog par byed pa'i mi //
analyzed: lan gcig klog par byed pa'i mi //

original: srid pa nyam ngar gang byas pa //
analyzed: srid pa nyam ngar gang byas pa //
translated: all the negative actions🔽they have accumulated in the lower realms.

original: sdig pa kun @204b las grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sdig pa kun @204b las grol bar 'gyur //
translated: And will be freed from all evil.🔽They will not be harmed by rākṣasas,

original: srin po la sogs chom rkun dang // mtshon dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing //
analyzed: srin po la sogs chom rkun dang // mtshon dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing //

original: dus min 'chi las rab tu thar //
analyzed: dus min 'chi las rab tu thar //
translated: And will be completely freed from untimely death.

original: rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur //

original: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang //
translated: Even at the time of death,

original: ngan 'gro rnams las bsrings 'gyur te //
analyzed: ngan 'gro rnams las bsrings 'gyur te //
translated: They will be rescued from the lower realms.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs bzung nas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs bzung nas //
translated: Having been taken up by the buddhas,

original: bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur //
translated: They will be reborn in Sukhāvatī.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste mngon par bstod do //
translated: Having spoken thus, the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced and praised the Blessed One.

original: 'phags ma lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags ma lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī of the Eight Goddesses is complete.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra bo dhi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra bo dhi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
translated: Translated, edited, and finalized by the Indian preceptor Śīlendrabodhi and the great editor-translator Bandé Yeshé Dé.
